duties_responsibilities.duty: Run general ledger accounts and bookkeeping including monthly closing according to local GAAP and IFRS/US GAAP.
Maintenance of cost and profit centers, standard costing, and project-based costing in the ERP system.
Overseeing subsystems relevant for Month-end closing e.g. semi-annual physical inventory management.
Manage staff responsible for accounting data entry and motivate various non-reporting functions.
Monitoring cost variance in concert with Production and Engineering teams.
Prepare annual budgets together with Director of Finance and Leadership team members and project budgets with Project Managers.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Accounting (Master’s degree in business administration (MBA) and / or CPA highly desirable)
